languages.text: "Доложите ситуацию по беженцам. Как они размещены, как их контролируют?"
"Give me a proper report on the refugees. How were they quartered? How are they supervised?"
languages.original_text: "Доложите ситуацию по беженцам. Как они размещены, как их контролируют?"

traits.locale_text: "Give me a proper report on the refugees. How were they quartered? How are they supervised?"
"Give me a proper report on the refugees. How were they quartered? How are they supervised?"
"Give me a proper report on the refugees. How were they quartered? How are they supervised?"
"Give me a proper report on the refugees. How were they quartered? How are they supervised?"
"Give me a proper report on the refugees. How were they quartered? How are they supervised?"

languages.text: 「避難民について詳しい報告をしてくれ。宿舎はどのように確保した？監督はどのように行われている？」
languages.original_text: "Give me a proper report on the refugees. How were they quartered? How are they supervised?"

traits.locale_text: 「避難民について詳しい報告をしてくれ。宿舎はどのように確保した？監督はどのように行われている？」

languages.text: “给我一份正式的难民报告，那些人都呆在什么地方？是什么人在负责看管他们？”
languages.original_text: "Give me a proper report on the refugees. How were they quartered? How are they supervised?"

traits.locale_text: “给我一份正式的难民报告，那些人都呆在什么地方？是什么人在负责看管他们？”

languages.text: « Faites-moi un rapport complet sur les réfugiés. Comment sont-ils logés ? Comment sont-ils supervisés ? »
languages.original_text: "Give me a proper report on the refugees. How were they quartered? How are they supervised?"

traits.locale_text: « Faites-moi un rapport complet sur les réfugiés. Comment sont-ils logés ? Comment sont-ils supervisés ? »

languages.text: «Quiero un informe completo de los refugiados. ¿Cómo se les ha alojado? ¿Cómo se les supervisa?».
languages.original_text: "Give me a proper report on the refugees. How were they quartered? How are they supervised?"

traits.locale_text: «Quiero un informe completo de los refugiados. ¿Cómo se les ha alojado? ¿Cómo se les supervisa?».

languages.text: "Gebt mir einen umfassenden Bericht über die Flüchtlinge. Wo wurden sie untergebracht? Wie werden sie überwacht?"
languages.original_text: "Give me a proper report on the refugees. How were they quartered? How are they supervised?"

traits.locale_text: "Gebt mir einen umfassenden Bericht über die Flüchtlinge. Wo wurden sie untergebracht? Wie werden sie überwacht?"

languages.text: "Mülteciler hakkında derli toplu bir rapor istiyorum. Nasıl bir yerde kalıyorlar? Nasıl gözetiliyorlar?"
languages.original_text: "Give me a proper report on the refugees. How were they quartered? How are they supervised?"
